title: Mingjia ‚ÄòJacky‚Äô Guan
text:
üåü About Me
Hi, I‚Äôm Jacky. I‚Äôm a Machine Learning Engineer at Deledao and recently graduated from Fei Tian College - Northern Campus with a Bachelor of Science in Data Science, Magna Cum Laude.
I am passionate about technology, leveraging data-driven approaches to solve real-world problems, and continuously expanding my technical skill set. While I mainly focus on the engineering aspect of Machine Learning, I‚Äôm no stranger to DevOps, Full-Stack, the list goes on.
Since I‚Äôm still early in my career, there is a lot to learn from the field. I will continue my education by pursuing a MS in Quantum Computing to stay ahead of the curve while striving to be a part in revolutionizing the K-12 Ed-Tech landscape with Machine Learning.






TipHowever‚Ä¶



This is my website, so I will tell you more about myself. I believe in making the world a better place, something that always starts at the individual level.


Practicing Falun Dafa, an ancient spiritual practice rooted in Buddhism, has strengthened my resolve in doing what is right in the current state of affairs.
On a social level, I‚Äôve written for the health department at The Epoch Times on topics such as immune exhaustion, soaring egg prices, and everything else in-between.
At the academic level, I enjoy helping peers and students with their work as an instructor and drafting up lecture notes for the next batch of undergraduates. After putting my DevOps experience to good use at Sunregen Healthcare AG, contracting as a system administrator, I am now serving as a Technical Solutions Architect at my own company, MG Solutions. Reach out to me and let‚Äôs grab a (virtual) coffee to see how I can help you automate and scale your business.



Stowe 2025


At the same time, I‚Äôve been skiing since 2008 and run my own little channel where you can check out my videos.


üõ†Ô∏è Technical Aspects
Work nowadays is supercharged by AI. I use  to accelerate my workflow as it includes the latest models from , , , and  I frequently browse  for other models to tune and deploy. Using  has made tab management a breeze. I primarily work on  but have my fair share of experience on  and am currently deploying this website using . While it is tempting to switch over to  or become a hardcore and use , I‚Äôm still more than happy with  and the incredible compatibility it offers. Maybe I can try out  or  to catch up to the hype train, but for now I will still try to be a traditional coder.
Technically speaking, I‚Äôm not experienced with anything special. You can see , , and , along with a bunch of methods and frameworks on there like , , , , , using tools like , workflows like , and more. While I manage my tasks using  and making things on the side using  I‚Äôve learned a lot using , , , , and have tried out the occasional competition on .
If we‚Äôre going back to the technical side of things, of course I use  and am intimidated by , but that is just the beginning of it. While I was never a huge fan of deploying websites with , , , , , and , frameworks like  and , or scraping the web with . I‚Äôm even thinking of writing a package and publishing it to . Of course, while  offers the best UI experience with good old , I work mostly in , staying close to traditional flavors like . In any case, something about  creeps me out.
At the core, I code mostly with . It is a good language, unlike , and much preferred over,  (or , since it is the way to go). I‚Äôm familiar with , , and of couse a fair bit of  and  to write those docs, but my goal is to learn  to be much faster.
Of course, I use  and , but not any of those common social media platforms like , , or . While I have accounts there, you will barely see me posting anything in any case.
Please follow me on . It‚Äôs always intersting that even payment methods like , , , , and  all get their own badges. I‚Äôm a fan of , preferring it over  and , but that‚Äôs just my preference. These badges are fun to play around with‚Ä¶

title: Contact
text:
Let‚Äôs Build Something Amazing Together
Whether you‚Äôre working on an exciting project, have a research question, or want to discuss the latest developments in AI and machine learning, I‚Äôm here to connect. Drop me a line and let‚Äôs start a conversation!

Feel free to reach out in English, German, or Chinese - I‚Äôm comfortable communicating in all three languages.

title: Technical Skills
text:
Deledao Technologies | Jun 2025 ‚Äì Present
Hybrid

Spearheaded R&D initiatives for multilingual ML product suite including website classification and student wellness monitoring, optimizing model deployment workflows to achieve 98%+ accuracy on Chinese language classification for Taiwanese market despite resource constraints
Evaluated 30+ baseline classification models for drug, tobacco, and weapons detection, implementing transformer-based architecture that achieved 91.95% Macro-F1 score on holdout validation set
Accelerated production-grade deployment timelines through automated preprocessing pipelines and AWS infrastructure optimization, supporting 3x sales volume growth capacity




MG SOLUTIONS | Mar 2025 ‚Äì Present
Remote

Architected and executed complete infrastructure migrations for 3+ SMB clients over 1-3 month engagement cycles, transitioning from vendor-locked platforms (GoDaddy, Microsoft 365) to self-hosted VPS environments
Deployed Docker-based containerized environments on Ubuntu VPS with Nginx Proxy Manager, Cloudflare DNS/DDoS protection, and Prometheus monitoring stacks, achieving 99.5% uptime
Implemented cost-effective self-hosted solutions including Mailcow email servers and Nextcloud storage platforms, eliminating recurring SaaS subscriptions while maintaining enterprise-grade reliability
Delivered hands-on technical training to non-technical business owners, enabling autonomous infrastructure management without requiring in-house IT expertise




Deledao Technologies | Aug 2024 ‚Äì May 2025
Part-time, Remote

Engineered 7+ post-deal automations for invoicing, provisioning, and data cleanup processes, transitioning company from manual Excel/Google Sheets workflows to integrated HubSpot system
Eliminated 15% redundant company data through systematic CRM cleanup while establishing 5+ cross-department communication channels for improved operational efficiency
Implemented scalable infrastructure with automated guardrails and business intelligence reporting, enabling 3x sales volume growth without additional manual overhead




Fei Tian College - Middletown | Jan 2024 ‚Äì Present
On-site
Adjunct Instructor (Oct 2025 ‚Äì Present)

Course Instructor for Linear Algebra (MAT 201), delivering comprehensive instruction to cohort of ~20 undergraduate students

Undergraduate Teaching Assistant (Jan 2024 ‚Äì Oct 2025)

Supported instruction across 4 courses: Statistics (STA101), Data Mining (DAS331), Data Structures (COS205), and Linear Algebra (MAT201), incorporating industry insights into curriculum delivery
Developed LaTeX and Quarto-based lecture materials including slides and notes, improving content delivery and student comprehension metrics
Provided one-on-one tutoring and structured feedback on coursework, supporting exam preparation and enhancing overall learning experience for both introductory and advanced students




The Epoch Times | Jul 2022 ‚Äì Aug 2023
Remote

Produced 30+ evidence-based health articles garnering 34,000+ social media shares, demonstrating expertise in translating complex medical research for global audience
Co-coordinated daily health talk show (500k+ YouTube subscribers), facilitating expert discussions on trending health topics and conducting stakeholder interviews
